original: Methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevanapaccayā āpattiyo catunnaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ katamaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ?
analyzed: methunam dhammam paṭisevana paccayāḥ āpattiyaḥ catunnam adhikaraṇānam katamam adhikaraṇa

original: Methunaṁ dhammaṁ paṭisevanapaccayā āpattiyo catunnaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ āpattādhikaraṇaṁ …pe….
analyzed: methunam dhammam paṭisevana paccayā āpattiyaḥ catunnam adhikaraṇānaṃ āpatta adhikaraṇam pe

original: Anādariyaṁ paṭicca udake uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā karaṇapaccayā āpatti catunnaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ katamaṁ adhikaraṇaṁ?
analyzed: anādariyam paṭicca udake uccāram vā passāvam vā kheḷam vā karaṇa paccayā āpatti catunnam adhikaraṇānam katamam adhikaraṇa

original: Anādariyaṁ paṭicca udake uccāraṁ vā passāvaṁ vā kheḷaṁ vā karaṇapaccayā āpatti catunnaṁ adhikaraṇānaṁ āpattādhikaraṇaṁ.
analyzed: anādariyam paṭicca udake uccāram vā passāvam vā kheḷam vā karaṇa paccayā āpatti catunnam adhikaraṇānam āpatta adhikaraṇa
